thread.title_full: 2015 Distinguished Faculty Achievement Awards Ceremony (University of Arkansas) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 2015 Distinguished Faculty Achievement Awards Ceremony (University of Arkansas)
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) Today at 3 p.m., the Office for Faculty Development and Enhancement and the Teaching Academy will host a ceremony honoring the 2015 Baum and Alumni Association Distinguished Faculty Achievement Award
